title: Manifest
description: Acode plugin manifest that is contained inside the file `plugin.json`

author.description: Details about the plugin author, including name, email, URL, and GitHub username.

changelog.description: URL to the changelog file documenting version updates and modifications.

contributors.description: An array of objects containing details about project contributors.

dependencies.description: An array plugins to be installed along with plugin

icon.description: Path to the icon.png file, serving as the visual representation of the plugin. Icon file size must less than or equal to 50Kb

id.description: Unique identifier for the plugin, following the reverse domain name format or what ever you want (e.g., "com.example.plugin").

keywords.description: An array of strings providing searchable terms related to the plugin.

main.description: Path to the bundled main.js file or your plugin's main javascript file, which contains the actual code for the plugin.

minVersionCode.description: Minimum Acode version code required to run the plugin. The plugin will be available only for Acode versions greater than or equal to the specified code.

price.description: Price of the plugin in INR (Indian Rupees). If set to 0 or omitted, the plugin is free. This attribute allows for monetization of plugins with a defined price range.

readme.description: URL to the readme.md file, providing documentation and information about the plugin.

version.description: Version number of the plugin. Must be incremented for updates.

license.description: License under which the plugin is distributed. It can be a URL to the license file or a string representing the license type.

repository.description: URL to the plugin's repository, typically on GitHub or similar platforms.
